name: Odin's Eyes
description:
Submitted to Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1 with the theme "Stronger Together"

When Odin's one remaining eye goes missing, it is up to Huginn and Muginn to help their owner find it. 

[Currently the game only contains the one level]

Controls:
Left Click - Move Huginn
Right Click - Move Muninn
Space Bar - Call Odin to Huginns Location

Liscences:

Highland Song by Alexander Nakarada (www.serpentsoundstudios.com) Licensed under Creative Commons BY Attribution 4.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/"Rockfall in mine" by Benboncan https://freesound.org/people/Benboncan/sounds/60085/ The sound has been edited to fit into the game
